title: V-neck mini dress
description: Short, A-line dress in a cotton weave. Deep V-neck front and back, narrow, tie-top shoulder straps, and horizontal ties at the back. Unlined.

title: V-neck dress
description: Short dress in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Deep V-neck front and back with horizontal ties at the back of the neck, and voluminous, wide 3/4-length sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs. Gathered seam under the bust at the front and at the back of the waist. Unlined.

title: Ribbed jersey dress
description: Long-sleeved dress in ribbed cotton jersey with a deep, round neckline, fitted bodice and flared skirt.

title: Jersey bodycon dress
description: Calf-length, sleeveless bodycon dress in jersey. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a sweetheart neckline. Shaped cups, flat felled seams front and back, a seam at the waist and a straight-cut hem.
